name: Intro to Computer Science
description: Introduces basic computer science concepts and principles, including algorithms, data structures, and programming principles.

name: Discrete Structures
description: Introduces discrete mathematics, including sets, logic, functions, relations, counting, and probability.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms I
description: Introduces basic data structures and algorithms, including stacks, queues, lists, trees, and hash tables.

name: Computer Organization and Architecture
description: Introduces the basics of computer organization and architecture, including memory, arithmetic, and input/output.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms II
description: Introduces advanced data structures and algorithms, including sorting, searching, and graph algorithms.

name: Algorithms
description: Introduces advanced algorithms, including divide and conquer, dynamic programming, and greedy algorithms.
